704810f-a.title: Brooklyn: Hegeman Avenue - Herzl Street
704810f-a.text:
Hegeman Ave., north side, east of Herzl to Chester Streets, showing at
left, the Ryerson hodse at its new site, and facing Hopkinson Ave.
August 1922.
Eugene L. Ahmbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
704810f-a.folder: Hegeman Avenue & Herzl Street, Brooklyn, NY
